function.name: waterHeatingTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the hot water temperature of a boiler's hot water function to a specific value.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the hot water temperature.

waterHeatingTemperature.description: The specific value to set the hot water temperature to.

predefinedWaterHeatingTemperatureUnit.description: The unit of the temperature value (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
